home.hero_description: Don't know which column to choose? Our AI advisor provides instant technical recommendations based on your application. Backed by 10 years of expertise and 11 world-class brands.
home.why_choose_subtitle: Not just a supplier - Your chromatography problem-solving partner
home.advantage_1_desc: Get instant technical recommendations from our AI advisor, trained on 10+ years of chromatography expertise. Can't find the answer? Our expert Oscar is here to help.
home.advantage_2_desc: Compare and choose from Waters, Agilent, Phenomenex, Thermo Fisher, Merck, and 6 more leading brands. HPLC/GC columns, SPE cartridges, consumables - everything in one place.
home.advantage_3_title: From Inquiry to Delivery - We Handle Everything
home.advantage_3_desc: Expert customs clearance, fast worldwide shipping, professional packaging for fragile items, and post-sale technical support. We make international purchasing hassle-free.

home.testimonials_subtitle: Trusted by researchers and laboratories worldwide
home.testimonial_1_text: ROWELL has been our go-to supplier for chromatography consumables. Their product quality is excellent, and the pricing is very competitive. The technical support team is always helpful in resolving analytical method issues. We especially appreciate their fast delivery and comprehensive product range.
home.testimonial_2_text: We work with ROWELL for our chromatography consumables needs. Their product quality is consistent, and they offer competitive pricing. The ordering process is straightforward, and their team is responsive to our inquiries. Overall, a reliable supplier for our routine testing needs.
home.testimonial_3_text: Working with ROWELL has been a great experience. Their chromatography consumables perform reliably, and the technical support is excellent. The team is knowledgeable and always willing to help with method development. Their competitive pricing allows us to allocate more budget to other research areas.

usp.title: USP Standards Reference
usp.subtitle: Professional USP standard matching for your analytical needs
usp.intro: The United States Pharmacopeia (USP) provides standardized column classifications to ensure consistency in analytical methods. Our products are categorized according to USP standards.

L1.name: Octadecylsilane (C18)
L1.details: The most widely used HPLC stationary phase for reversed-phase separations.

L7.name: Octylsilane (C8)
L7.details: Shorter alkyl chain than C18, providing different selectivity.

L11.name: Phenylsilane
L11.details: Provides π-π interactions for aromatic compounds.

L60.name: HILIC
L60.details: Hydrophilic interaction chromatography for polar analytes.

applications.title: Applications
applications.subtitle: Chromatography solutions for diverse analytical needs across industries
applications.intro: Our chromatography consumables serve a wide range of applications across pharmaceutical, environmental, food, and research sectors. With over 10 years of experience, we provide technical support to help you select the right consumables for your specific analytical needs.

pharmaceutical.title: Pharmaceutical Analysis
pharmaceutical.description: Drug purity testing, impurity profiling, and stability studies

environmental.title: Environmental Testing
environmental.description: Water quality analysis, pesticide residue detection

food.title: Food & Beverage
food.description: Additive analysis, contaminant detection, quality control

biochemistry.title: Biochemistry
biochemistry.description: Protein analysis, peptide mapping, amino acid analysis

clinical.title: Clinical Research
clinical.description: Biomarker discovery, metabolomics, drug metabolism studies

chemical.title: Chemical Industry
